extendedInfo.description: The EMLab P&K app makes your work easier by giving you mobile access to your lab results anytime, anywhere. Now you can review your projects and reports as they are made available, browse EMLab P&K's fungal library and IAQ Pocket Reference Guide, and contact your Project Manager with the tap of the screen.Projects:â¢	Receive instant alerts when your reports are availableâ¢	Search and access details of all your projects and reportsâ¢	Download and view reports on your mobile device*â¢	Confirm requested services, turnaround times, and reporting due datesContact PM:â¢	Call your EMLab P&K Project Manager (PM) with one touchâ¢	E-mail your PM about a specific project, which automatically includes your project IDFungal Glossary:â¢	Access EMLab P&K's fungal glossary directly in the appâ¢	Search over 130 fungi with detailed information about eachIAQ Pocket Reference Guide:â¢	Access the EMLab P&K Pocket Guide directly in the app . â¢	Sampling and regulatory guidelines  â¢	Data interpretation guidelines  â¢	MoldRangeâ¢ data, including typical outdoor spore levels by region and by time of year. â¢	Environmental resource and contact information, and more.* An appropriate reader is required to view reports on your mobile deviceNOTE: E-mail customerservice@emlabpk.com with questions or suggestions for the EMLab P&K Android app.

reviews.title: The perfect app for the field
reviews.comment: This app has came in handle, time after time. Thank you so much for this guide.
reviews.author: Kari Holmer
